title: Ryan Murphy Gives BREAKING American Horror Story Season 8 News and Rumors
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: With the nuclear thing, I think it ties in with what Dr. Arden was doing in season 2
Excited to see what Joan Collins brings as well!!  I would be even more excited to see Anjelica Huston join the cast...
my god if they call it "radioactive" id really consider not watching 😂 that just doesn't sound like an AHS name at all.
GOOD! 👍 Asylum was my favorite! Love that dark element & feel. ❤️👏
I really want a season to be subtitled American Horror Story: Ghost Town
description:
American Horror Story co-creator, Ryan Murphy, gave breaking news regarding season 8 of our favorite show! Mother Supreme is here to give you all the details and address rumors online.

Special thanks to @ahsleak on Twitter and the group members of the Freaks of AHS on Facebook for the information.
